evidence.claim: Lenkbar utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure including Lambda functions for serverless computing.
The company ensures compliance with HIPAA regulations for handling health data.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated via FHIR APIs, ensuring standardized health data exchange.
Lenkbar employs Azure SQL for their databases which supports data analytics and management.
Detailed use of HL7 standards is mentioned for ensuring interoperability with health systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities.
